app_descript:
Cast to TV

Brief: Cast to TV empowers you to mirror your mobile device's screen to your television with ease. Whether it's streaming your favorite videos, music, or sharing a photo slideshow with family and friends, this app ensures a high quality and stable connection. Control all your media from the convenience of your phone and upgrade your viewing experience.

Core Features:

  • üì° Stable Connection: Enjoy uninterrupted mirroring of your mobile screen to your TV.
  • üåü High-Quality Streaming: Choose to stream in full 1080p resolution for crystal-clear images and sound, or opt for lower resolutions to suit your needs.
  • üì± Phone as a Remote Control: Utilize your phone to manage TV functions such as pause, volume control, and media navigation.
  • üéûÔ∏è Local Playback: Easily play videos that are stored locally on your device or SD card.
  • üîç Automatic Media Identification: The app automatically detects video, audio, and photo files on your device for quick casting.
  • üí° Tailored for All Media Types: Perfectly designed for casting videos, music, and photo slideshows in various modes like shuffle and loop.

Pros:

  • üëç User-Friendly Interface: Navigate easily through the app's functions without a hassle.
  • üëç Multi-Format Support: Cast a wide range of media formats from your device to the TV.
  • üëç No Need for Additional Hardware: Operate without the need for dongles or cables, provided your TV supports casting.
  • üëç Custom Playback Modes: Enjoy your media your way, with various playback settings to enhance your experience.

Cons:

  • üëé Device Compatibility: Some users may encounter compatibility issues with certain TV models or mobile devices.
  • üëé Network Dependency: A stable Wi-Fi connection is crucial; performance may suffer with weak networks.
  • üëé Battery Consumption: Streaming content from your device to the TV can drain your phone's battery faster.
  • üëé Potential for Ads: The presence of ads may interrupt your viewing experience if it's not a premium version.

Price: üíµ Cast to TV is available for free with potential in-app purchases. The specifics of any premium features and pricing details are to be checked within the app's pricing section.

Get Cast to TV on Google Play Store
